messages.subject: Client Proposal Submission
messages.body:
Dear Client,
Please find attached our comprehensive proposal for the upcoming project. It includes timelines, deliverables, and cost estimates. We believe our solution aligns with your business goals and provides a scalable platform for growth. Let me know if you have any questions or require further adjustments.
Best regards,
Project Manager

messages.subject: Re: Client Proposal Submission
messages.body:
Hello,
Thank you for the detailed proposal. We will review it internally and get back to you with feedback by next week. Looking forward to our collaboration.
Kind regards,
Client Sales Team
